entry.tran: 行情看跌的；熊市的（Compare 比较 bullish.)
entry.def: On the stock market, if there is a bearish mood, prices are expected to fall.

example.tran: 交易员说投资者依然看跌。

example.ex: Many traders forecast a continuation of the market's  recent bearish trend.

sentences.en: It is foolish not to invest in stocks, so I will show her how to be bearish without them too, if she chooses.
sentences.cn: 不投资股票是愚蠢的，因此如果她选择股票，我会向她展示怎样在没有长期潜力的情况下进行卖空。
